verbs.description: art or signs [ARG0: easton officials] [V: order] [ARG1: artist] [ARG2: to remove project that violates zoning] easton officials have ordered the removal of two large signs with curse words at the gallery of artist shalom neuman on spring garden street not because of their content but because their size violates zoning code neuman art shalom neuman josef dian west ward president donald trump easton
